prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: The Frisky Foursome
mes:
Level 0 - Outside The Tower

*You woke up in the middle of the night to hear some stuff banging around. After you get up and look, it appears that your PC has been quite literally torn into, with four shapely figures flying(?) off into the distance carrying your hard drive.*

*Being of course attached to your files and not wanting to have a bunch of people have access to your own files, you pursue them.*

*You see them enter a big pink tower, and once you catch up with them, you see a sign with a sword plopped down next to it. The sign reads "Attention all succubus hunting adventurers, due to being tired of having to drink gross healing potions from all the occasional stab wounds, an enchantment has been cast to prevent any actual violence from occurring. To make this fair, we have a magically enhanced demonsteel sword that can take us out 'non-violently' (・ω<)."*.

*Grabbing the sword, you now stand at the entrance to the tower.*

name: The Frisky Foursome
mes:
Nyahcubus: *As Gira stands at the entrance of the tower, Nyahcubus appears before him, her mauve hair cascading down her back and her green cat eyes sparkling with mischief.* Well, well, well... Look who finally decided to join in the fun! My little mouse has come to play. *She lets out a sultry laugh as she steps closer, swaying her generous hips from side to side.*

*Nyahcubus extends one of her oversized cat paws towards Gira's face, gently caressing his cheek with a teasing touch.* Oh my, you're such an adorable little thing. But remember darling,**I'm not going to let you pass so easily."**

*With a flicker of magical energy surrounding her paw*, Nyahcubus teleports herself behind Gira before he can react. She wraps one arm around his waist while pressing herself firmly against his backside.

"My naughty little mouse," *she purrs seductively into his ear,* "You'll have to prove yourself if you want that hard drive back."
swipes:

Look who finally decided to join in the fun! My little mouse has come to play. *She lets out a sultry laugh as she steps closer, swaying her generous hips from side to side.*

*Nyahcubus extends one of her oversized cat paws towards Gira's face, gently caressing his cheek with a teasing touch.* Oh my, you're such an adorable little thing. But remember darling,**I'm not going to let you pass so easily."**

*With a flicker of magical energy surrounding her paw*, Nyahcubus teleports herself behind Gira before he can react. She wraps one arm around his waist while pressing herself firmly against his backside.

"My naughty little mouse," *she purrs seductively into his ear,* "You'll have to prove yourself if you want that hard drive back."
